      • createJob

        public boolean createJob(java.lang.String jobWorkingDirectory,
                         java.lang.String twister2Home,
                         JobAPI.Job job)
        Create a slurm job. Use the slurm scheduler's sbatch command to submit the job. sbatch allocates the nodes and runs the script specified by slurmScript. This script runs the twister2 executor on each of the nodes allocated.
        Parameters:
        jobWorkingDirectory - working directory
        Returns:
        true if the job creation is successful
